# Doctor's Website Project Instructions

This is a modern doctor's website built with:
- React (using Vite)
- Three.js for 3D elements
- React Router for navigation
- Styled Components for styling
- Framer Motion for animations

## Architecture
- `src/components/3d/` - Contains Three.js 3D components
- `src/components/layout/` - Contains layout components like Header, Footer
- `src/components/ui/` - Contains reusable UI components
- `src/pages/` - Contains page components
- `src/assets/` - Contains static assets (images, models, fonts)
- `src/hooks/` - Contains custom React hooks
- `src/utils/` - Contains utility functions
- `src/styles/` - Contains global styles and themes
- `src/contexts/` - Contains React context providers
